title: Echocalypse Tier List
description: Comprehensive Echocalypse tier list categorizing cases from S Tier to C Tier, highlighting their strengths and roles in the game.
heading: Echocalypse Tier List
introText: Comprehensive Echocalypse tier list categorizing cases from S Tier to C Tier, highlighting their strengths and roles in the game.

data.itemDescription: She possesses exceptional combat talent, with her swordsmanship skills continually improving under Sil's guidance

She is an AoE Mage DPS who excels at dealing debuff-based Magic DMG and damage over time through [Burn] and [Haze] effects. She is especially effective against enemy teams with high defense or formations focused on the front line
She has the trait "Fetal Flaw", suggesting she possesses unique combat abilities that exploit enemy weaknesses
An SSR rarity case known for her high damage output and versatility in various team compositions
An SSR supporter who enhances the attack of all allies and provides silence debuffs to enemies, making her invaluable in both PvE and PvP modes
A free SSR case given on the 7th day of play, excelling as an AOE damage dealer with high damage multipliers
An SSR case capable of dealing significant AOE damage while reducing enemies' resistance and armor
An SSR AOE-controller who depletes enemies' rage and provides immunity buffs to allies, effective in both PvE and PvP scenarios
An SR healer offering substantial healing and support to the team, enhancing overall survivability
An SSR damage dealer who excels when buffed, dealing increased damage based on the number of buffs compared to the enemy
An SSR supporter providing healing and buffs, enhancing team durability in various game modes
An SSR case with balanced offensive and defensive capabilities, fitting well into multiple team compositions
An SSR case known for her crowd control abilities, effectively disrupting enemy strategies
An SR case offering AOE damage and silence debuffs targeting backline enemies, useful in specific PvP scenarios
An SR AOE damage dealer with the ability to revive one ally upon death, providing strategic advantage in battles
An SR supporter offering utility through buffs and debuffs, enhancing team performance in various situations
An SR damage dealer with balanced stats, suitable for early to mid-game content
An SR case with supportive abilities, providing healing and buffs to allies
An SR supporter providing shields and AOE damage to frontline enemies, beneficial in early-game stages
An SR damage dealer effective in early-game, offering AOE magic damage and additional attacks on high-attack enemies
An SR case with utility skills, though outperformed by higher-tier cases in later stages
An SR case with moderate damage output, suitable for early-game but less effective in advanced content
An SR case with niche abilities, offering limited utility in most team compositions
